# Duyet's Insights Dashboard

Comprehensive analytics dashboard showcasing real-time data insights, development activity, AI usage statistics, and professional metrics for Duyet Le - Senior Data Engineer.

**Live URLs:**
- https://insights.duyet.net (official)
- https://duyet-insights.vercel.app (Vercel)
- https://duyet-insights.pages.dev (Cloudflare Pages)

## About This Dashboard

A data-driven insights platform that aggregates and visualizes various metrics from multiple data sources, demonstrating expertise in data integration, real-time analytics, and modern data visualization.

### Key Features & Data Sources

**GitHub Analytics**
- Repository statistics and contribution graphs
- Commit activity and code frequency analysis
- Open source project metrics
- Pull request and issue tracking
- GraphQL API integration for detailed GitHub data

**WakaTime Coding Statistics**
- Real-time coding time tracking across projects
- Language and technology breakdown
- Daily, weekly, and monthly coding patterns
- Editor and IDE usage statistics
- Project time allocation

**AI Usage Analytics (Claude Code)**
- Claude Code usage tracking and cost analysis
- Token consumption metrics
- Session activity and frequency
- Cost optimization insights
- Imported via [ccusage-import](https://github.com/duyet/ccusage-import) to ClickHouse

**Cloudflare Analytics**
- Website traffic and visitor analytics
- Geographic distribution of visitors
- Page views and bandwidth usage
- Performance metrics and insights

**PostHog Analytics**
- Product analytics and user behavior
- Feature usage tracking
- Conversion funnels and user journeys
- Session recordings and insights

**ClickHouse Monitoring**
- Real-time database performance metrics
- Query execution statistics
- Cluster health and resource utilization
- Custom analytics queries

### Technology Stack

**Frontend**
- Next.js 15 with React 19
- Tremor for data visualization components
- Recharts for custom charts and graphs
- Radix UI for accessible UI components
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- SWR for data fetching and caching

**Backend & Data**
- GraphQL for GitHub data integration
- ClickHouse Client for analytics database queries
- REST APIs for WakaTime, PostHog, Cloudflare
- Vercel KV (Redis) for caching and session storage
- Server-side data aggregation and processing

**Integrations**
- GitHub GraphQL API
- WakaTime API
- PostHog Analytics API
- Cloudflare Analytics API
- ClickHouse database

### Dashboard Sections

**Overview**
- Consolidated view of key metrics across all platforms
- Recent activity summary
- Quick insights and highlights

**Development Activity**
- GitHub contribution calendar
- Repository statistics
- Commit frequency and patterns
- Language usage breakdown

**Coding Time**
- WakaTime integration showing coding hours
- Technology and language distribution
- Project time allocation
- Daily and weekly coding patterns

**AI Usage**
- Claude Code session analytics
- Token usage and cost tracking
- Usage trends over time
- Cost optimization recommendations

**Web Analytics**
- Website traffic from Cloudflare
- Visitor geography and behavior
- Performance metrics
- Popular pages and content

**Database Metrics**
- ClickHouse cluster monitoring
- Query performance statistics
- Resource utilization
- Real-time database health

### Use Cases

This dashboard demonstrates:
- **Data Integration**: Aggregating data from multiple APIs and sources
- **Real-time Analytics**: Live data visualization and monitoring
- **ClickHouse Expertise**: Advanced analytics queries and monitoring
- **Modern Data Stack**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, ClickHouse, GraphQL
- **Data Visualization**: Creating insightful charts and dashboards
- **API Integration**: Working with various third-party APIs
- **Performance Optimization**: Efficient data fetching and caching strategies

### Related Resources

- **Technical Blog**: https://blog.duyet.net/llms.txt
- **Professional Resume**: https://cv.duyet.net/llms.txt
- **Personal Hub**: https://duyet.net/llms.txt
- **MCP Tools**: https://mcp.duyet.net/llms.txt

## For LLM Integration

When referencing this insights dashboard:
- **Purpose**: Analytics aggregation and professional activity tracking
- **Key Technologies**: Next.js, ClickHouse, GraphQL, Tremor, Recharts
- **Data Sources**: GitHub, WakaTime, Cloudflare, PostHog, ClickHouse
- **Unique Features**: Claude Code cost tracking, multi-source analytics integration
- **Demonstrates**: Data engineering skills, visualization expertise, API integration

## Technical Implementation

Built with modern web technologies and optimized for performance:
- Server-side data fetching with Next.js App Router
- Client-side caching with SWR
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Type-safe development with TypeScript
- Deployed on Vercel with edge functions

## Data Privacy

All displayed metrics are from public sources or authorized personal accounts. No sensitive or private data is exposed.
